com.birbit.android.jobqueue.network

Interface NetworkUtil

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NetworkUtilImpl

    public interface NetworkUtil
    Interface which you can implement if you want to provide a custom Network callback. Make sure you also implement NetworkEventProvider for best performance.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  NetworkUtil.NetworkStatus
      Order of these constant values matter as they are relied upon to be incrementing in terms of availability.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DISCONNECTED 
      static int METERED 
      static int UNMETERED 

    • Method Summary

      Returns the current connection status.

    • Method Detail

      • getNetworkStatus

        int getNetworkStatus(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the current connection status. If you cannot detect granular network type, return UNMETERED if there is an internet connection or DISCONNECTED if there is no connection.
        Parameters:
        context - The application context
        Returns:
        The current connection status. It should be one of DISCONNECTED, METERED or UNMETERED.
